EMPLOYMENT IN BIGGIN HILL
There are 4,000 employed residents and 80% of these commute to Croydon, Central London or Bromley Town Centre. In Biggin Hill the main sources of employment are in teaching and local shops and services. There are 350 jobs on the air-field in the R.A.F. (at the Air Crew and Officer Selection Centre), air charter, aeronautical engineering, flying clubs and a small 16 unit industrial estate.
Written by pupils from: Cudham C.E. Primary School Downe Country Primary School Biggin Hill Junior School Ravensbourne School for Boys Charles Darwin School Typed by: Paula Salzer of Charles Darwin School
